# Do Not Edit This File
#
# Files and folders the Replicator will always skip.
# Drive or Share <tab> Path <tab> file <tab> comment
#
# If * = Exclude All Drive/Shares, Folders or Files
###########################################

*	\Recycler\	*	Recyle Bin	True
*	\$Recycle.Bin\	*	Recyle Bin (Vista)	True
*	Temp	*	Temporary folders	True
*	\	pagefile.sys	Page File	True
*	\	hiberfil.sys	Hibernation File	True
*	*	Thumbs.db	Thumbnail images	True
*	*	Desktop.ini	Folder settings	True
*	\System Volume Information\	*	System Drive Info	True
*	Temporary Internet Files	*	Internet Browser Cache	True
*	NetHood\	*	Network Neighborhood links	True
*	PrintHood\	*	Printer links	True
